entries.journal_entry_description: The attacking pirates have taken 4 people hostage in one of the cargo bays downstairs.  Help them by giving them a camouflage kit so they have an edge to sneak out when the opportunity presents itself.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Go to the Hangar Bay that holds the hostages. Once there, sneak in with the Camouflage Kit that you were given. You then have 15 minutes to sneak in, give the hostages their kits, and get out safely.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Talk to the first hostage and tell them that you are giving them a Camouflage Kit.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Talk to the second hostage and tell them that you are giving them a Camouflage Kit.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Talk to the third hostage and tell them that you are giving them a Camouflage Kit.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Talk to the fourth hostage and tell them that you are giving them a Camouflage Kit.
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: Now that you have given the hostages their Camouflage Kits, return to Rylen for a reward.
entries.task12_journal_entry_description: You have delivered the camo kits to the hostages.
